name: Will Bridge: Practice 4: Competition
overview: WILL BRIDGE-Practice 4: Competition. The set-PRACTICE has been developed for you to improve your bridge learning at a competition level. Offered in a GAME FORMAT it enables you to make rapid progress, regardless of your level. Endorsed by the European Bridge League. 1-INTRODUCTION TO BIDDING 2-INTERMEDIATE 3-ADVANCED 4-COMPETITION 5-ADVANCED COMPETITION
